sentences.en: Brazilian and Russian multinationals are also starting to make their mark.
sentences.cn: 巴西和俄国的跨国公司也在攻城掠地.

sentences.en: Brazilian nut oil - rich in essential nutrients known to boost skin's moisture barrier.
sentences.cn: 巴西果仁油 - 含有丰富的基本营养素众所周知,提高肌肤的水分屏障.

sentences.en: Brazilian palm yielding fibers used in making ropes, mats, and brushes.
sentences.cn: 出产用于制造绳索 、 地席和刷子的纤维的巴西棕榈.

sentences.en: Brazilian soccer boss Carlos Parreira hit out angrily last night after his side were barred from training at Wembley.
sentences.cn: 昨晚巴西足球队主帅卡洛斯·佩雷拉因球队被禁止在温布利球场训练而大发雷霆。

sentences.en: Do you want to know more about Brazilian Culture?
sentences.cn: 你想了解更多关于巴西的文化吗？

sentences.en: However, Brazilian agriculturalists and ministers still talk as if it had no conservation value at all.
sentences.cn: 然而巴西农学家和部长们还说它根本没有保护的价值。

sentences.en: I am proud of my Brazilian roots.
sentences.cn: 我为我的巴西血统感到自豪。

sentences.en: I love coming here and working with Brazilian teachers!
sentences.cn: 我很喜欢来到这里并和巴西的教师一起工作!

sentences.en: It was a great showing by the Brazilian team.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛成了巴西队的表演赛.

sentences.en: NBD employed waxed Brazilian teak for the stairs, floor, and mantel.
sentences.cn: NBD公司采用了上过蜡的西班牙柚木装点楼梯 、 地面及壁炉架.

sentences.en: One way to get a quick answer is to compare Brazilian states with countries.
sentences.cn: 快速得到答案的一种方式是将巴西各州与其他国家相比。

sentences.en: Portuguese players now get shown as being eligible to gain Brazilian nationality.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙球员现在可以正确显示已获得的巴西国籍.

sentences.en: Teresinha Roberts is a Brazilian - born textile artist specialising in natural dyes.
sentences.cn: 使用天然染料是让人兴奋和沉醉的.

sentences.en: The Brazilian team is regarded as unbeatable.
sentences.cn: 巴西队可以说是不可战胜的.

sentences.en: The Guyana Defence Force is engaged in flushing out illegal Brazilian miners operating in the country.
sentences.cn: 圭亚那国防军正采取行动驱逐在本国作业的非法巴西矿工。

sentences.en: The president has appealed to the Brazilian people for patriotism and community spirit.
sentences.cn: 总统已经呼吁巴西人民要有爱国情怀和集体主义精神。

sentences.en: The Republic is a dominion of the Brazilian people.
sentences.cn: 这个共和国是巴西人民的领土。

sentences.en: Why don't we try some Brazilian food?
sentences.cn: 我们为什么不吃巴西人的食物 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: relating to Brazil or its people
